contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary}} '''North Korean''' may refer to: * Something of, from, or related to the country of [[North Korea]] * A [[Koreans|Korean]] from North Korea, or of North Korean descent. For information about the North Korean people, see [[Demographics of North Korea]] and [[Culture of North Korea]]. * the [[Korean language]] [[Northâ€“South differences in the Korean language|as spoken in North Korea]], including a number of [[Korean dialects]]. == See also == * [[Special:Allpages/North Korean|List of all pages beginning with "North Korean"]] {{disambig}} <!-- Long comment to avoid being listed on short pages -->
